snippet: A dinner and party at the New York Edition hotel provides a nice diversion for those on the art circuit.
abstract: Celebrities gather at New York Edition hotel for dinner and party celebrating W magazine's Art issue.
lead_paragraph: A dinner and party at the New York Edition hotel provides a nice diversion for those on the art circuit.

headline.print_headline: A Party Crawl in the Name of Art
headline.main: A Party Crawl in the Name of Art
